attributes.action: Petition to stop a commucation mast on  Whynot St and Foxcote Lane Cradley
attributes.additional_details: Harleyquin are the contracter who will install and maintain the mast which will be a provider for EE. The land where the purposed comunication mast will be installed is a small triangular piece of land approx 35ft at the longest end with a house frontage directly on.
attributes.background: This is a petition for the residents who will be affected by the proposed commucation mast on Whynot St and Foxcote Lane and surrounding areas. This petition will be handed into DMBC along with a paper petition opposing the mast.

rejection.details:
This petition is calling on Dudley Metropolitan Borough Council to take action, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council about a planning issue - you can find out more here: 

http://www.dudley.gov.uk/resident/planning/planning-services/advice-and-guidance/petitions-/
